label: 大夫
本: The History of Research on the Ancient Ritsuryo System and the Comparative Study of the Ritsuryo System in Recent Years. ACTA ASIATICA, 99 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 2010-08
説明文: Counselors to the throne who attended on the emperor, and the fourth rank inherited the position of taifu from before the Taika Reform.
